Summary Note:
The RM met Emma Araceli Jiménez at a yacht party in Madrid. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Having worked for over 27 years, Emma Araceli Jiménez brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Emma Araceli Jiménez and Soto have been married since 1999. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1992, Emma graduated from IES María Zambrano Sevilla with a secondary school diploma.
She then attended Complutense University of Madrid, which she graduated in 1998.
Occupation History:
Emma Araceli Jiménez is a 50 year old and comes from Spain.
In 1998, Emma Araceli Jiménez started working as a Family Office Manager at CaixaBank S.A., marking the beginning of her successful career.
She then transitioned to BBVA S.A. as a Investment Director, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2002 to 2007.
From 2009 till now, she served as a CFO at Banco Santander S.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 340000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns house in Jerez de la Frontera, where she resides. It is worth 1690000 EUR.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 2850000 EUR from her late mother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2012.
Client Summary: In summary, Emma has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
